name: Zorent L
description:
Hello, this is a game for "Tu juego a juicio Jam" by Alva Majo.

I am a novice game developer and this is my first game. I'd have like to work on the game more, but I wasted a lot of time solving novice problems.

I put a restart option if something goes wrong during the game.

I hope you enjoy the game and any comment or criticism is welcome
